department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: The Photographer as Auteur: Studio Course
course.description: Explores the way in which some photographic practitioners have questioned accepted photographic conventions and are rejecting the historical orthodoxy in favor of a more subjective statement. Each student is expected to complete a major photographic project that reveals his or her own personal photographic style and preoccupations while still retaining a direct and discernible relationship to the subject.
course.prerequisites: At least one half-course in photography.
